RELATSEX.title: RELATSEX
RELATSEX.description: The last time you had sex, was it with someone you were in an on-going relationship with, or was it with someone else?  Remember that by 'sex' we mean only vaginal, oral or anal sex.
enumDescriptions: Yes, the last time I had sex, it was with someone I was in an on-going
